You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &delta;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Delta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0394/index.htm U+00394].
  * `&delta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b4/index.htm U+003B4].
